body.header: Read the text below and practise giving a short talk.
body.section:
PART 2 OF THE INTERVIEW
The Examiner says “Now I'm going to give you a topic. You will have one to two minutes to talk”. The Examiner explains that you can make notes, and hands over paper and pencil, and reads out the topic to you.
1 Find pencil and paper
2 Read the instructionsDescribe the technological device you find most useful.You should say:- why you got it- what you use it for- what advantages and disadvantages it has and explain how it has changed your life-style
3 Write down some ideas – you have one minute to think starting now
4 Stop writing when one minute is up (or before)
5 You now have two minutes to talk, starting now! (Don't be embarrassed!)
